scripts.prefinnodev: node minify.js -d; node minify.js -d -p -u=http://localhost:8080 ../website/; node render.js -u=http://localhost:8080 ../website/
scripts.prefinnotest: node minify.js -d; node minify.js -d -p -u=http://finnoconsult-wip.surge.sh ../website/; node render.js -u=http://finnoconsult-wip.surge.sh ../website/
scripts.finnobuild: node minify.js; node minify.js -p ../website/; node render.js ../website/
scripts.prefinnodeploy: yarn cleanpublic;yarn finnobuild; echo 'remember to create backup with [yarn finnobackup] command at least the first daily deploy'
scripts.preblogdev: node minify.js -d; node minify.js -d -p -u=http://localhost:8080 ../blog/; node render.js -u=http://localhost:8080 ../blog/
scripts.preblogtest: node minify.js -d; node minify.js -d -p -u=http://finnoconsult-blog.surge.sh ../blog/; node render.js -u=http://finnoconsult-blog.surge.sh ../blog/
scripts.blogbuild: node minify.js; node minify.js -p ../blog/; node render.js ../blog/
scripts.preblogdeploy: yarn cleanpublic;yarn blogbuild; echo 'remember to create backup with [yarn blogbackup] command at least the first daily deploy'
scripts.preinnodev: node minify.js -d; node minify.js -d -p -u=http://localhost:8080 ../../innovaciostanacsado/website/; node render.js -u=http://localhost:8080 ../../innovaciostanacsado/website/
scripts.preinnotest: node minify.js -d; node minify.js -d -p -u=http://innovaciostanacsado-wip.surge.sh ../../innovaciostanacsado/website/; node render.js -u=http://innovaciostanacsado-wip.surge.sh ../../innovaciostanacsado/website/
scripts.innobuild: node minify.js; node minify.js -p -u=http://www.innovaciostanacsado.com  ../../innovaciostanacsado/website/; node render.js -u=http://www.innovaciostanacsado.com ../../innovaciostanacsado/website/
scripts.preinnodeploy: yarn cleanpublic;yarn innobuild; echo 'remember to create backup with [yarn innobackup] command at least the first daily deploy'
